title: Yo La Tengo - They Shoot, We Score (2008) [mp3@VBR]
description:
Genre : Soundtrack, Indie, Rock, Pop, Experimental, Instrumental 
Released 12 Sept 2008 
Lenght: 57:17

Tracks 24-27: Shortbus

Personnel
Georgia Hubley - vocals, drums, keyboards 
Ira Kaplan - vocals, guitar, keyboards 
James McNew - vocals, bass 
Doug Wieselman - clarinet (Junebug) 
Garo Yellin - cello (Junebug) 
Katie Gentile - violin (Junebug) 
Margaret White - viola (Junebug) 
Amy Kimball - violin (Junebug) 
Dennis Cronin - trumpet (Junebug) 
Smokey Hormel - guitar (Old Joy) 
Sabir Mateen - alto saxophone (Shortbus) 

It contains music from the movies Old Joy (starring Will Oldham), Junebug (featuring but not starring Will Oldham), Game 6, and Shortbus. (Their music for the forthcoming Ryan Reynolds vehicle Adventureland didn't make the cut.)
Of the 27 instrumental tracks on They Shoot, We Score, 26 are previously unreleased. The CD comes with a booklet containing posters for each movie "from around the world," according to the band's website.
Yo La Tengo will start shipping They Shoot, We Score on the aforementioned September 5 release date. On that date, a digital download option will also become available.
The album was released with different covers using the posters for each of the films as a cover.
